text: 14.3-4: Wkp 18.16 naŋga, 20.21 naŋga, Mt 11.2 naŋga, 21.26 naŋga, Lu 3.19-20 naŋga, 20.6Kuha Herodiasɨŋ Herot urami, nu nɨŋura Filip nɨmburi. Kamatɨhi Jon Herotɨŋ nɨmavami, Navundi kaŋambɨŋ urahana avimandɨ, vami. Kamavahi Jonɨŋ Herot mɨŋahandata siki takɨrɨ maña tɨkatɨka hɨmɨñɨ kahañata ñamba vana andɨhu tamandu upɨyɨ tamami.
